textbox.title: Get your app done right
textbox.pitch: Wizdm provides all the key features of a modern single page application ready to use, so, for you to focus on launching your idea the quickest!

action.caption: Explore
action.hint: Join us üôèüèª and become part of the revolution of [Wizdm](about)

features.title: Responsive navigation
features.description: Navigation smoothly adapts to the device the application renders to.

features.title: Modular design
features.description: Desiged with full modularity to enable collaboration while minimizing the final bundle size and loading time.

features.title: UI elements
features.description: Rich collections of advanced UI elements ready to use for you to avoid re-inventing the wheel.

features.title: Icon sets
features.description: Both [Material](https://material.io/icons) icons font and [FontAwesome](https://fontawesome.com) icon set are natively supported to enrich you user interface.

features.title: Emoji Support
features.description: Universal emoji rendering capabilities to always offer the best user experience no matter the platform.

features.title: Animate On Scroll
features.description: Ready to use animation set with built-in "Animate on Scroll" trigger to enrich your contents with catching-eye motion

features.title: Theming
features.description: Easily define the application theme thanks to the theming capabilities based on the guidance from [Material Design](https://material.io/archive/guidelines/style/color.html#color-color-palette)

features.title: Internationalization
features.description: Thanks to a flexible content manager at its core, wizdm handles as many lanuages as you need at once.

features.title: IP geolocation
features.description: Country level and City level IP info localization supported by [IpList](https://iplist.cc/) and [IpInfo](https://ipinfo.io/) *API*s.

features.title: Account management
features.description: User authetication, email verification and recovery, rich user profile data and account cancellation.

features.title: Data synchronization
features.description: Real-time online and offline data sync based on severless *NoSQL* database ready for global level scale.

features.title: File storage
features.description: File uploading capabilities for user profile image and more.

features.title: Static content
features.description: *Markdown* rendering to quickly set up static contents such as terms of service and privacy without extra coding.

features.title: Syntax Highlighting
features.description: Code syntax highlighting powered by [PrismJS](https://prismjs.com/)

features.title: Content editing
features.description: Powerfull built-in *WYSIWYG* content editing capabilities to serve your needs.

features.title: Feedback form
features.description: Direct feedback support powered by [Doorbell.io](https://doorbell.io) to immediately collect user's suggestions.

features.title: Smart redirection
features.description: Prevents unwanted external redirections to keep the user engaged.

features.title: Simple search
features.description: Simple data search performed server side with no need of expensive third party serivces.

features.title: Full text search
features.description: Full text search powered by [Algolia](https://www.algolia.com) for the time your app get traction.

features.title: Cookie Consent
features.description: Inform your user about the use your app is doing of cookies so to comform with regulations.

features.title: Google Analytics
features.description: Measure how user interacts with your app even before they are ready to give you a feedback abour their experience.

features.title: Unsplash
features.description: Beautifull royaltiy free images from [Unsplash](https://unsplash.com/).

features.title: Paypal
features.description: Payment processing powered by [Paypal](https://www.paypal.com).

features.title: Payments
features.description: Payment processing powered by [Stripe](https://stripe.com).

features.title: Angular powered
features.description: Designed using the latest edge technologies for maximum performances and compatibility.

features.title: Open source
features.description: Wizdm is *100%* open source and supported by a growing community.

features.title: For bootstrappers
features.description: Designed and mantained by the very same bootstrappers actively using it to fuel their initiatives.
